price: (127) And [mention] when Abraham was raising the foundations of the House and [with him] Ishmael, [saying], "Our Lord, accept [this] from us. Indeed, You are the Hearing,[42] the Knowing.[43]
arabic: وَإِذۡ يَرۡفَعُ إِبۡرَٰهِـۧمُ ٱلۡقَوَاعِدَ مِنَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِ وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلُ رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلۡ مِنَّآۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
footnotes:
[42]- Who hears every sound, distinguishes every voice, understands every word, and accepts and responds to supplications.
[43]- Refer to footnote in 2:32.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-idh yarfaʿu ib'rāhīmu al-qawāʿida mina al-bayti wa-is'māʿīlu rabbanā taqabbal minnā innaka anta al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
